name: UVAO Forever
summary: A short novel that originated from a story on the Russian imageboard IIchan. On December 29, 2007, a thread was created there where a certain Moscow anonymous user shared how they met a "certain someone"—specifically, a catgirl—at a McDonald's on Pushkinskaya and took her home to Kuzminki, located in the South-Eastern Administrative District of Moscow. The story, beloved by anons for its "warm and cozy vibe," achieved the status of a "classic copypasta," and the catgirl was nicknamed UVAO-tan, became one of the mascots, and inspired many creative works. UVAO Forever is a Christmas card-style novella that serves as a "prequel" to the original story.

name: UvsU: You vs. You
summary: Outsmart your past self in a battle of cause and effect. Explore an interconnected clay world, discover its hidden rules, and uncover the secrets it would rather keep buried.

name: uVolley
summary: A new vision of the volleyball video game developed by a volleyball player, play a match or league in single player mode, two players or multiplayer, wear your visor and you are in the game...

name: UvsU
summary: Outsmart yourself, iteration by iteration. You alternate between playing as the hero and the enemies. There's no AI in this game- It's replaying what you did previous iterations.

name: Uventa
summary: The tragic fate brings you, a simple night guard, to an abandoned school. Plunge into a horrifying story and get to the bottom of the secret that this spectre of the long-gone Soviet era has in store.
